title: Tombstone Metadata
description: Metadata contains information on why, when and by whom a digital object was tombstoned

@type.description: The type of the record, in this case a ods:Tombstone

ods:tombstonedDate.description: Timestamp the Digital Object was tombstoned and no longer active.

ods:tombstonedText.description: A reason why the Digital Object was tombstoned
examples: This is a duplicate of XXX
This object was made by mistake

ods:TombstonedByAgent.description: The agent who tombstoned the object, contains an ods:Agent object

ods:hasRelatedPID.description: The PIDs of the object the tombstoned object is related to

ods:ID.description: The PID of the related object

ods:relationshipType.description: The type of relationship between the tombstoned object and the related object
